sera-digital-hub.title: SERA DIGITAL HUB - Backend Developer
sera-digital-hub.content:
• Developed and maintained websites like sera.com.np, sera.edu.np, and jobs.sera.com.np using Astro, PHP, MySQL.
  • Collaborated on scalable backend solutions.
  • Enhanced teaching with real-world development insights.

projects.title: SERA Main Website
projects.description: Main corporate website for SERA Digital Hub.

gyansagar-academy.title: Gyansagar Academy - Secondary Level Teacher
gyansagar-academy.content:
• Managed school’s website and app as IT Head.
  • Taught Mathematics, Computer Science, and Occupation Studies.
  • Implemented digital tools for better learning experiences.

tedx-ncit.title: TEDxNCIT - Co-Organizer
tedx-ncit.content:
• Organized TEDx event at NCIT, handling planning and execution.
  • Ensured TEDx licensing compliance.
  • Contributed to website development and speaker coaching.
  • Managed event logistics for success.

projects.title: TEDxNCIT Website
projects.description: Official website for TEDxNCIT, built with Astro, TypeScript, and TailwindCSS.

tedx-kamal-pokhari.title: TEDxKamal Pokhari - Head of Marketing
tedx-kamal-pokhari.content:
• Led marketing and communication strategies.
  • Managed sponsorships and partnerships.
  • Coordinated promotions and event execution.

projects.title: TEDxKamal Pokhari Website
projects.description: Official website for TEDxKamal Pokhari, designed and developed by me.

hard-skills.title: hard-skills
hard-skills.description:
As a full-stack developer, I have experience with languages including Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP, C#, C, and C++.

My framework and library knowledge encompasses Astro, Django, React, jQuery, Tailwind CSS, and data science tools like Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Scikit-Learn, and TensorFlow. I'm also proficient with databases such as SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, NoSQL, and MongoDB, as well as cloud services like AWS (EC2, Lambda, S3).

soft-skills.title: soft-skills
soft-skills.description:
I bring organization and leadership skills developed through my role as Co-Organizer for TEDxNCIT and Head of Marketing and Communication for TEDxKamal Pokhari.

My experience in teaching has also honed my communication and presentation abilities, allowing me to explain complex technical concepts in accessible ways. Through collaborative projects, I've developed strong teamwork skills and the ability to work effectively under pressure.

bio.title: bio
bio.description:
About me
I am a final year Software Engineering student at Nepal College of Information Technology with experience in full-stack development. My professional background includes working as a Backend Developer at SERA DIGITAL HUB and teaching at Gyansagar Academy.

I am passionate about creating efficient, user-friendly solutions through software development and have successfully worked on projects like PulsePath, FoodFind, and TEDxNCIT website. I'm also actively involved in organizing events like TEDx to foster knowledge sharing and community engagement.

interests.title: interests
interests.description: I am constantly learning and expanding my skills in software development, with a particular interest in web development and creating impactful solutions.

content.title: Karunanidhi Education Foundation
content.points: • Completed high school education with a focus on science and mathematics.

content.title: Nepal College of Information Technology
content.points:
• Pursuing Bachelor’s in Software Engineering (Final Year).
  • Awarded full scholarship by Pokhara University.

music.title: music
music.description:
I have a deep appreciation for music, enjoying both old and new songs, especially classic Nepali tracks that hold a timeless charm.
Lately, I have been dedicating time to learning the guitar, exploring its melodies and building my musical skills. This pursuit not only provides a creative escape but also enhances my understanding of rhythm and harmony.

anime-and-books.title: anime-and-books
anime-and-books.description:
I am an avid fan of anime and manga, immersing myself in their rich storytelling, unique art styles, and thought-provoking themes.
Additionally, I enjoy reading books, constantly expanding my knowledge and engaging with different genres to fuel my imagination and intellect.

6.title: _MatchMate
6.description: A web-based multiplayer game built with ASP.NET Framework, powered by SignalR for real-time interactions.
